title: Super Spacious 3Bed 2Bath Ukrainian Village
posting_body: ['1753 W Augusta 1F, Chicago, IL 60622-3209', 'Super Spacious 3Bed 2Bath Ukrainian Village', 'Super Spacious 3Bedroom 2Bathroom unit currently being renovated and available for an August move in!', 'Experience living in this totally awesome unit with 15ft ceilings, a wide spacious living room area, a hallway that leads to two full size bathrooms, including dual vanity sinks and spa-like showers, and 3 Large bedrooms with great closet space.', 'Kitchen is being completely updated with modern white cabinetry and ample counter space to come including room for an eat-in dining table.', 'In-unit laundry, updated hardwood flooring in a lighter buffed shade, new electrical, new blinds, new doors, central AC & Heat, and walkable to Wicker Park, Division Street restaurant row, CTA transportation, and more!', 'Pet friendly with some breed restrictions.', '*Pictures are of the before renovation and the current progress of the rehab.', 'Finished photos coming soon.', 'Schedule an appointment to come see the unit for the best sense of the space!', '(We do not do sight unseen.)', 'No security deposit required.', 'Non-refundable admin fee of $950.', '$250 per pet fee.', 'Available 8/1.']
